message:
SYSTEM: Designing_a_Text_Classification_System_using_Statistical_NLP.pdf: Página 22
• Linear  
– Decides class membership by comparing a linear combination of 
the features to a threshold 
– E.g., Naive Bayes, Logistic regression, Support vector machine 
SVM. 
Learning Method 
• Non-linear 
– More versatile 
– Might suffer of overfitting: Fails to Generalize 
– E.g., K nearest neighbor, SVM with kernel trick.
speaker: SYSTEM
